tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Iam happy with the gums treatment given by the dr sumeet.my deep cleaning went good here. The process was almost painless and bleeding stopped completely :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: came here with tooth pain complaint and Dr Sumeet explained it really well the problem he recommended root canal treatment and crown fixing. It went smoothly, painless too. Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Sumeet is really professional. One of the most soft spoken and dedicated doctors I have come across.
Focuses on explaining the problem in detail and then suggests the available option for the patient to choose. His wife Dr. Anargha  is equally accommodating and professional with her approach.
Also, the equipment and tools being used are industry best.

I would certainly recommend this clinic to my friends and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Sumeeth is very friendly and explained things clearly. Quite happy with the visit. He handled my tooth problem in the simplest possible way. Also appreciated the existing filling, that it is really good and it would last for 50 years if I take decent care and avoid cavity. I felt good about that :)

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Both Dr Anargha and Dr. Sumeet Singh are very good at treating their patient.I got my Root Canal treatment and crown for teeth done.Dr Sumeet did an excellent job and even I got relieved of my fear of Dentist post visiting them I highly recommend Dr Sumeet Singh and Dr Anargha for dental treatment.
reply_text: Thank you Ma'am for your valuable feedback. Hope to serve everyone with the best we can.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This is by far one of the most organized and well managed services I have ever experienced. It is so well managed, that it hardly feels like you are visiting your Dentist, but instead a High End clinic with portable xray .All of the equipment used for the dental procedures are well sanitized. The Doctor is extremely polite and very well experienced and is more than happy to help you. He explained the importance of natural teeth unlike other dentists who want replace your teeth and place a artificial teeth .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very friendly treatment done and very nice environment and latest equipment is using on treat ment no Paine very good dentist

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor explained about the problem and treatment which he doing. He also clarified the queries which I  had. The best part is that he gives enough time in explaining the problem  and about treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dear sir/Madam
Easily understood what I am saying is..... Very cool nice people..... Once again I am gng to visit.
Thank you
